annotation.value: Detect Threat Using PingOne Protect

nodeTitle.value: Create PingOne Protect Risk with user and Environment details

nodeDescription.value: Should have required variables to start the risk evaluation.

nodeTitle.value: Detect Threat

nodeDescription.value: Check if PingOne protect has detected a BOT, AITM or Disposable Email attack

nodeTitle.value: Threat detected response.

nodeDescription.value: Response back when a threat is detected.

annotation.value: More details: https://apidocs.pingidentity.com/pingone/platform/v1/api/#put-update-risk-evaluation
Input Schema:  required are: skriskcomponent, userName, flowType, ipAddress and optional are: userID, isAccountEnabled, applicationId, SessionId, riskPolicyID, customAttributes
Take action based on threat detected. Visit PingOne Protect documentation for more information on this.
Returns PingOne Risk Level, PingOne Risk Eval ID, PingOne Recommended Action, City, State values
Create Protect Risk Evaluation after getting required inputs.
